topicTitle: Nblckk Ctrl Alt Defeat Admin app

posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for: Nnjg ttt admin
2) Your age: (You can disclose this information to us privately if you wish) 15
3) Your location: (Country, timezone) Arkansas, central
4) Current In-Game Name: [Nblckk] Ctrl Alt Defeat
5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile: STEAM_0:1:28365925, http://steamcommunity.com/id/NBLCKK/
6) How did you find out about NNJG: got banned from my other ttt server on my birthday, joined nnjg from a list of servers, loved it
7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers: 1 year 11 days
8) What you can bring to the NNJG Team: (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/Other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, etc.) I have owned my own servers and admined them before, i am aslo taking programming classes at my school so i hope to bring free coding to nnjg soon.
9) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team: because this is my favorite community ever!
10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for:yes i do as stated before i have admined my own servers before
11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it: have a freaking beast microphone, and yes i use it, typing gets you killed
12) Any other comments or information you can provide: I want you to know in the year ive been with nnjg, i havent broken a rule, been slayed, kicked, banned, or had a ban request so ponder that! and ofc ill be a great loving admin.
